data.title: Ann Sothern Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Ann Sothern with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Daughter of a diction-and-vocal coach who worked in Hollywood during the advent of talking pictures

Was so popular on USO tours that one crew named their plane "Sothern Comfort

" Lifelong friend and collaborator of Lucille Ball

Has two stars in the Hollywood Walk of Fame, one for her movie work and another for her TV career

Awards

1988Independent Spirit Awards-Best Supporting Female: nominated

1987Oscar-Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role: nominated

1965Golden Globe-Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role in a Motion Picture: nominated

1959Emmy-Best Actress in a Leading Role (Continuing Character) in a Comedy Series: nominated

1957Emmy-Best Continuing Performance by a Comedienne in a Series: nominated

1956Emmy-Best Actress - Continuing Performance: nominated

1955Emmy-Best Actress Starring in a Regular Series: nominated
